News

  • City Council Meeting - April 16th, 2019

    The agenda for the April 16th, 2019 Regular Meeting of the Gillette City Council is available online.

  • Yard Waste Drop-Off Facility Closed

    The Yard Waste Drop-Off Facility will be closed temporarily.

  • 2019 Winter Parks Photo Contest Winners Announced

    The City of Gillette Parks and Beautification Board is pleased to announce the winners of the 2019 Winter Parks Photo Contest.
